name: ICDEV Builder
description: Code generation with TDD methodology. Writes tests first (Cucumber/Gherkin), then generates implementation code, scaffolds projects, and runs linting/formatting.

skills.name: Write BDD Tests
skills.description: Generate BDD tests in Cucumber/Gherkin format with step definitions for behave. Tests are written before implementation (TDD).

skills.name: Generate Code
skills.description: Generate implementation code from specifications with proper structure, docstrings, type hints, and CUI headers.

skills.name: Scaffold Project
skills.description: Create project scaffolding from templates including directory structure, config files, Dockerfile, and compliance artifacts.

skills.name: Lint Code
skills.description: Run language-specific linters (flake8 for Python, eslint for JavaScript) and return structured findings.

skills.name: Format Code
skills.description: Apply code formatting (black+isort for Python, prettier for JavaScript) to ensure consistent style.
